whatIsService.title: What Is a Carbon Peel Facial?
whatIsService.content:
The **Carbon** **Peel** **Facial**, also known as the **Carbon** **Laser** **Facial** or **Hollywood** **Peel**, is a non-invasive laser treatment designed to deeply cleanse pores, reduce oiliness, fade pigmentation, and leave the skin instantly refreshed.

The procedure involves applying a thin layer of medical-grade liquid carbon to the skin, which penetrates deep into the pores. When activated with a laser, the carbon particles absorb oil, dirt, and dead skin cells - providing a powerful **pore** **cleansing** **facial** while stimulating collagen production.

At The Skin Firm, NIBM, Pune we use advanced **carbon** **peel** **technology** **for** **acne** **&** **pigmentation** **treatment**, helping patients achieve clearer, brighter, and younger-looking skin - with zero downtime.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Carbon Peel (Hollywood Peel) Facial at The Skin Firm?
whyChooseUs.description: Unlike salon facials that only work on the surface, our **Carbon** **Peel** **treatment** is medical-grade and dermatologist-supervised, ensuring safe and visible results.
whyChooseUs.highlight:
At The Skin Firm, our Carbon Peel Facials are:

> **Performed** **by** **experts** - under the care of Skin Specialist Dr. Karishma Singh

> **Advanced** **&** **precise** - using FDA-approved carbon laser technology

> **Customised** - protocols tailored for acne, pigmentation, or ageing concerns

> **Results-driven** - offering both instant glow and long-term improvements

Whether you want **laser** **facial** **for** **oily** **skin**, need help with pigmentation, or want a **Bridal** **Glow** **Facial** **in** **Pune**, the Carbon Peel facial is the perfect choice.

process.title: How Our Carbon Peel Facial Works

steps.title: Cleansing & Prep
steps.description: The skin is cleansed, and a thin layer of carbon lotion is applied, which penetrates deep into pores.

steps.title: Carbon Activation with Laser
steps.description: A laser passes over the skin, heating and shattering the carbon particles along with oil, impurities, and dead skin.

steps.title: Exfoliation & Collagen Boost
steps.description: The process gently exfoliates, unclogs pores, and stimulates collagen production for smoother, firmer skin.

steps.title: Cooling & Hydration
steps.description: The treatment is finished with soothing serums and SPF, leaving the skin soft, fresh, and radiant.

downtime.title: Downtime After Carbon Peel (Hollywood Peel) Facial
downtime.description:
**Zero** **Downtime** - return to routine immediately
**Mild** **Warmth** **or** **Redness** - may occur briefly but fades in hours
**Immediate** **Glow** - skin looks clearer and brighter right away
**Progressive** **Improvement** - long-term results with regular sessions
downtime.tipsTitle: Post-Care After Carbon Peel (Hollywood Peel) Facial
tips: Apply sunscreen daily to protect new skin
Avoid exfoliants or retinol for 3-5 days
Keep skin hydrated with gentle moisturisers
Avoid gym, steam, or hot showers for 24 hours

faqs.title: FAQs on Carbon Peel Facial in Pune

questions.question: What is a Carbon Peel Facial?
questions.answer: The **Carbon** **Peel** **Facial**, also known as the **Carbon** **Laser** **Facial** or **Hollywood** **Peel**, is a laser-based treatment where carbon lotion is applied to the skin and then activated with a laser. It deeply cleanses pores, provides pore cleansing facial benefits, exfoliates, and rejuvenates the skin.

questions.question: Is the Carbon Peel safe for all skin types?
questions.answer: Yes - the **Carbon** **Peel** **treatment** is safe, non-invasive, and customised for your skin type under dermatologist supervision by **Dr.** **Karishma** **Singh**.

questions.question: Does Carbon Peel Facial hurt?
questions.answer: No - it feels like a warm tingling or light snapping sensation, which is easily tolerable during the **laser** **facial** **for** **oily** **skin**.

questions.question: How long does one session of Carbon Peel Facial take?
questions.answer: Each session of the **Carbon** **Laser** **Facial** takes about 45-60 minutes.

questions.question: When will I see results after my Carbon Peel Facial?
questions.answer: Results are visible immediately after the **Carbon** **Peel** **Facial** **-** skin looks brighter, pores appear refined, and the glow is perfect for pre-event treatments like a **bridal** **glow** **facial**.

questions.question: How many sessions do I need?
questions.answer: For acne or pigmentation, 3-6 sessions of the **best** **Carbon** **Peel** **treatment** spaced 3-4 weeks apart are recommended for long-term results.

questions.question: Is there downtime after the Carbon peel treatment?
questions.answer: Minimal to none - you can resume daily activities right away. This is why the **Hollywood** **Peel** **or** **the** **carbon** **peel** **treatment** is called the “lunchtime facial.”

questions.question: Can Carbon Peel Facial help with acne scars?
questions.answer: Yes - the **Carbon** **Peel** **for** **acne** **&** **pigmentation** **treatment** helps improve skin texture and reduces scars gradually with repeated sessions.

questions.question: Is the Carbon Peel good for men too?
questions.answer: Absolutely - the **Carbon** **Peel** **Facial** is highly effective for men with oily, acne-prone, or dull skin.

questions.question: Can I get Carbon Peel Facial done before a wedding or event?
questions.answer: Yes - it’s one of the best **bridal** **glow** **facials** **in** **Pune**, offering instant glow and photo-ready skin with no downtime.
